name: Black My White Again
description:
Black My White Again is a puzzle game where you need to pick up all the red circles in specific in order to pass the challenge.
Face many different jumps from easy ones to extremely hard ones. You can travel to the black platform by using black dots, and to the white platform by using white dots.
You need to switch different platform to pick up red circles and finish your level. The game contains different traps which distract you from the mission.
Be careful and try to remember all the numbers to avoid ramble. Focus and try to pass the game as quickly as possible.
